programme.title: Bosnia and the Dayton Agreement
programme.short_synopsis: The US role in the Bosnian peace treaty of signed in Dayton in November 1995.
programme.medium_synopsis: A possible end to the conflict in Bosnia, the role of the US in the peace treaty, and why the city of Dayton became the venue for the signing in November 1995.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
